declarations.comments: Applies the function only once, when the predicate is satisfied (potentially immediately)
declarations.title: onWhenIx

declarations.comments: Applies the handler once
declarations.title: onAvailableIx

declarations.comments: Applies the function only once, on the next change
declarations.title: onNextIx

declarations.comments: Subscribe a handler to a random key
declarations.title: subscribeWithKey

declarations.comments: Subscribe without initial application
declarations.title: subscribeWithKeyLight

declarations.comments: Add a subscriber to the set, removing and using a specific named value if it exists
declarations.title: subscribeIxWithKey

declarations.comments: Add a subscriber to the set, without applying a value first. Deletes specific indexed named value, if it exists.
declarations.title: subscribeIxWithKeyLight

declarations.comments: Only respond to changes in signal's value, not submissions in total
declarations.title: subscribeIxWithKeyDiff

declarations.comments: Like `subscribeIxWithKeyDiff`, but without an initial firing
declarations.title: subscribeIxWithKeyDiffLight

declarations.comments: Publish a message to the set of subscribers
declarations.title: set

declarations.comments: Set a distinguished value for the index, storing if a subscriber is absent
declarations.title: setIx

declarations.comments: Gets the last message published to the subscribers
declarations.title: get

declarations.comments: Attempts to get the last named value, else use the global one.
declarations.title: getIx

declarations.comments: Removes all subscribers
declarations.title: clearSubscribers

declarations.comments: Removes all individual
declarations.title: clearIndividual

declarations.comments: Removes all from both
declarations.title: clear

declarations.comments: Create a signal with a starting value
declarations.title: make

declarations.comments: Alias for `make`
declarations.title: constant

declarations.comments: Creates a new signal, relaying the next incoming values from the old to the new, after transformation.
declarations.title: map'

declarations.comments: Same as map, but where each transformation might be effectful.
declarations.title: traverse'

declarations.comments: Add a subscribers to the set
declarations.title: subscribe

declarations.comments: Subscribe without invoking an initial call of the handler
declarations.title: subscribeLight

declarations.comments: Publish a message to the set of subscribers
declarations.title: set

declarations.comments: Gets the last message published to the subscribers
declarations.title: get

declarations.comments: Removes all subscribers
declarations.title: clear

declarations.comments: Create a signal with a starting value
declarations.title: make
